items.title: Deaerator
items.text: A technical device that implements the process of separation (separation) of gases from fuel, i.e. its purification from the present dissolved gas impurities

items.title: Principle of operation
items.text: Principle of operation: in a float-type deaerator, the process of separation (separation) of liquid fuel from gases takes place, and the separated air is removed from the deaerator chamber through an air valve

flowmeters.info: Sekee FM, DFM meters are used to measure the volume and volume flow of diesel fuel, gasoline, liquefied gas, kerosene, oil, oil with water, fuel oil and other liquids with dynamic viscosity from 1 to 1000 mPa*s

text: A device for measuring the volume of liquid that flows through a cross section of a stream per unit of time
